job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pThis position is a great opportunity for an entrepreneuriallyminded person who enjoys making a difference in a startup environment Looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to both create and extend existing modelsnbspppbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliBuild extend deploy maintain and troubleshoot machine learning solutions to help drive business metrics liliCollaborate with analytics and data teams to optimize machine learning model performance and data pipelinesliliEnsure our relevancy in the field of machine learning by staying up to date on the latest ML techniques and become the subject matter expert within the companyliliDevelop solutions to complex problems without considerable technical directionliulpstrongnbspstrongppbrppstrongQualifications and Experiencestrongpulli24 years of experience as a machine learning engineer or data scientistliliExperience with developing software in objectoriented programming languages including Python Scala Java or CliliExperience with machine learning tools including Tensorflow Pytorch or Scikit LearnliliProven and demonstrated experience with data preparation building scaling and optimizing machine learning solutionsliliSelfdriven organized reliable and determined team playerliliThinks analytically and solves complex problems within a team structureliliFlexible and able to adapt to new processes and requirements in a dynamic environmentliliStrong clear and concise written and verbal communication skillsliliAdvocates for innovation and drives change through persuasion and consensusliliTranslates issuesproblems into solutions with tangible changes that improve the team or the organizationliulpbrppUnfortunately this position does not offer work sponsorshipnbspat this timeppbrppbrppstrongemKeywordsemstrongem machine learning ML engineering data science programming models modeling python tools data building deploying scaling troubleshooting maintaining strategyemp
